general.name: mos_target_catwise2020
general.description: The CatWISE2020 Catalog (https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2021ApJS..253....8M/abstract) See https://irsa.ipac.caltech.edu/data/WISE/CatWISE/gator_docs/catwise_colDescriptions.html for more detailed column descriptions

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

releases.name: DR18
releases.description: SDSS unreleased data.  Represents any work-in-progress data.

general.naming_convention: $MOS_TARGET/[V_TARG]/mos_target_catwise2020-[NUM].fits, where V_TARG=1.0.1 for DR18; and NUM = 1..1 to partition the file into parts

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

source_id.name: SOURCE_ID
source_id.description: tile name + processing code + wphot index

ra.name: RA
ra.description: right ascension (J2000); (note uncorrected systematic in CatWISE2020)

sigradec.name: SIGRADEC
sigradec.description: cross-term of RA and Dec uncertainties

w1sigsk.name: W1SIGSK
w1sigsk.description: frame sky background value uncertainty, band 1

w1conf.name: W1CONF
w1conf.description: frame sky confusion based on the uncertainty images, band 1

w2sigsk.name: W2SIGSK
w2sigsk.description: frame sky background value uncertainty, band 2

w2conf.name: W2CONF
w2conf.description: frame sky confusion based on the uncertainty images, band 2

w1fitr.name: W1FITR
w1fitr.description: fitting radius for W1; see note

w2fitr.name: W2FITR
w2fitr.description: fitting radius for W2; see note

w1snr.name: W1SNR
w1snr.description: instrumental profile-fit photometry S/N ratio, band 1

w2snr.name: W2SNR
w2snr.description: instrumental profile-fit photometry S/N ratio, band 2

w1sigflux.name: W1SIGFLUX
w1sigflux.description: profile-fit photometry raw flux uncertainty, band 1

w2sigflux.name: W2SIGFLUX
w2sigflux.description: profile-fit photometry raw flux uncertainty, band 2

w1sigmpro.name: W1SIGMPRO
w1sigmpro.description: instrumental profile-fit photometry flux uncertainty in mag units, band 1

w1rchi2.name: W1RCHI2
w1rchi2.description: instrumental profile-fit photometry reduced chi^2, band 1

w2sigmpro.name: W2SIGMPRO
w2sigmpro.description: instrumental profile-fit photometry flux uncertainty in mag units, band 2

w2rchi2.name: W2RCHI2
w2rchi2.description: instrumental profile-fit photometry reduced chi^2, band 2

rchi2.name: RCHI2
rchi2.description: instrumental profile-fit photometry reduced chi squared, total

nb.name: NB
nb.description: number of blend components used in each fit

w1sat.name: W1SAT
w1sat.description: fraction of pixels affected by saturation, band 1

w2sat.name: W2SAT
w2sat.description: fraction of pixels affected by saturation, band 2

w1mag.name: W1MAG
w1mag.description: instrumental standard aperture (8.25") mag w/ aperture correction applied, band 1

w1sigm.name: W1SIGM
w1sigm.description: instrumental standard aperture mag uncertainty, band 1

w2mag.name: W2MAG
w2mag.description: instrumental standard aperture (8.25") mag w/ aperture correction applied, band 2

w2sigm.name: W2SIGM
w2sigm.description: instrumental standard aperture mag uncertainty, band 2

w1sigm_1.name: W1SIGM_1
w1sigm_1.description: aperture 1 instrumental aperture mag uncertainty, band 1

w2sigm_1.name: W2SIGM_1
w2sigm_1.description: aperture 1 instrumental aperture mag uncertainty, band 2

w1sigm_2.name: W1SIGM_2
w1sigm_2.description: aperture 2 instrumental aperture mag uncertainty, band 1

w2sigm_2.name: W2SIGM_2
w2sigm_2.description: aperture 2 instrumental aperture mag uncertainty, band 2

w1sigm_3.name: W1SIGM_3
w1sigm_3.description: aperture 3 instrumental aperture mag uncertainty, band 1

w2sigm_3.name: W2SIGM_3
w2sigm_3.description: aperture 3 instrumental aperture mag uncertainty, band 2

w1sigm_4.name: W1SIGM_4
w1sigm_4.description: aperture 4 instrumental aperture mag uncertainty, band 1

w2sigm_4.name: W2SIGM_4
w2sigm_4.description: aperture 4 instrumental aperture mag uncertainty, band 2

w1sigm_5.name: W1SIGM_5
w1sigm_5.description: aperture 5 instrumental aperture mag uncertainty, band 1

w2sigm_5.name: W2SIGM_5
w2sigm_5.description: aperture 5 instrumental aperture mag uncertainty, band 2

w1sigm_6.name: W1SIGM_6
w1sigm_6.description: aperture 6 instrumental aperture mag uncertainty, band 1

w2sigm_6.name: W2SIGM_6
w2sigm_6.description: aperture 6 instrumental aperture mag uncertainty, band 2

w1sigm_7.name: W1SIGM_7
w1sigm_7.description: aperture 7 instrumental aperture mag uncertainty, band 1

w2sigm_7.name: W2SIGM_7
w2sigm_7.description: aperture 7 instrumental aperture mag uncertainty, band 2

w1sigm_8.name: W1SIGM_8
w1sigm_8.description: aperture 8 instrumental aperture mag uncertainty, band 1

w2sigm_8.name: W2SIGM_8
w2sigm_8.description: aperture 8 instrumental aperture mag uncertainty, band 2

w1nm.name: W1NM
w1nm.description: number of profile-fit flux measurements for source with SNR >= 3, band 1

w1m.name: W1M
w1m.description: number of profile-fit flux measurements for source, band 1

w1magp.name: W1MAGP
w1magp.description: profile-fit repeatability mag -- inverse-variance weighted mean mag, band 1

w1sigp1.name: W1SIGP1
w1sigp1.description: standard deviation of population of profile-fit repeatability mag, band 1

w1sigp2.name: W1SIGP2
w1sigp2.description: standard deviation of the mean of profile-fit repeatability mag, band 1

w1ndf.name: W1NDF
w1ndf.description: number degrees of freedom in variability chi^2, band 1

w1mjdmin.name: W1MJDMIN
w1mjdmin.description: minimum modified Julian Date of frame extractions, band 1

w1mjdmax.name: W1MJDMAX
w1mjdmax.description: maximum modified Julian Date of frame extractions, band 1

w1mjdmean.name: W1MJDMEAN
w1mjdmean.description: mean modified Julian Date of frame extractions, band 1

w2nm.name: W2NM
w2nm.description: number of profile-fit flux measurements for source with SNR >= 3, band 2

w2m.name: W2M
w2m.description: number of profile-fit flux measurements for source, band 2

w2magp.name: W2MAGP
w2magp.description: profile-fit repeatability mag -- inverse-variance weighted mean mag, band 2

w2sigp1.name: W2SIGP1
w2sigp1.description: standard deviation of population of profile-fit repeatability mag, band 2

w2sigp2.name: W2SIGP2
w2sigp2.description: standard deviation of the mean of profile-fit repeatability mag, band 2

w2ndf.name: W2NDF
w2ndf.description: number degrees of freedom in variability chi^2, band 2

w2mjdmin.name: W2MJDMIN
w2mjdmin.description: minimum modified Julian Date of frame extractions, band 2

w2mjdmax.name: W2MJDMAX
w2mjdmax.description: maximum modified Julian Date of frame extractions, band 2

w2mjdmean.name: W2MJDMEAN
w2mjdmean.description: mean modified Julian Date of frame extractions, band 2

nsteps.name: NSTEPS
nsteps.description: number of steps in all iterations

p1.name: P1
p1.description: distance in ra from the mdet position to the wphot template-fit position

p2.name: P2
p2.description: distance in dec from the mdet position to the wphot template-fit position

ra_pm.name: RA_PM
ra_pm.description: Right ascension from psf model incl. motion at epoch MJD=56700.0 (2014.118) for Preliminary Catalog and MJD=57170 (2015.405) for CatWISE2020

dec_pm.name: DEC_PM
dec_pm.description: Declination from psf model incl. motion at epoch MJD=56700.0 (2014.118) for Preliminary Catalog and MJD=57170 (2015.405) for CatWISE2020

sigra_pm.name: SIGRA_PM
sigra_pm.description: One-sigma uncertainty in RA from psf model incl. motion

sigdec_pm.name: SIGDEC_PM
sigdec_pm.description: One-sigma uncertainty in DEC from psf model incl. motion

sigradec_pm.name: SIGRADEC_PM
sigradec_pm.description: The co-sigma of the equatorial position uncertainties from psf model incl motion

pmra.name: PMRA
pmra.description: Apparent motion in RA; (note uncorrected systematic in CatWISE2020)

pmdec.name: PMDEC
pmdec.description: Apparent motion in DEC; (note uncorrected systematic in CatWISE2020)

sigpmra.name: SIGPMRA
sigpmra.description: Uncertainty in the RA motion estimate

sigpmdec.name: SIGPMDEC
sigpmdec.description: Uncertainty in the Dec motion estimate

w1snr_pm.name: W1SNR_PM
w1snr_pm.description: S/N ratio of the W1 profile-fit photometry including motion

w2snr_pm.name: W2SNR_PM
w2snr_pm.description: S/N ratio of the W2 profile-fit photometry including motion

w1flux_pm.name: W1FLUX_PM
w1flux_pm.description: Raw flux W1 profile-fit photometry including motion

w1sigflux_pm.name: W1SIGFLUX_PM
w1sigflux_pm.description: Raw flux uncertainty W1 profile-fit photometry including motion

w2flux_pm.name: W2FLUX_PM
w2flux_pm.description: Raw flux W2 profile-fit photometry including motion

w2sigflux_pm.name: W2SIGFLUX_PM
w2sigflux_pm.description: Raw flux uncertainty W2 profile-fit photometry including motion

w1mpro_pm.name: W1MPRO_PM
w1mpro_pm.description: W1 magnitude from profile-fit photometry including motion

w1sigmpro_pm.name: W1SIGMPRO_PM
w1sigmpro_pm.description: W1 flux uncertainty in mag units from profile-fit photometry including motion

w1rchi2_pm.name: W1RCHI2_PM
w1rchi2_pm.description: Reduced chi^2 of the W1 profile-fit photometry measurement including motion est

w2mpro_pm.name: W2MPRO_PM
w2mpro_pm.description: W2 magnitude from profile-fit photometry including motion

w2sigmpro_pm.name: W2SIGMPRO_PM
w2sigmpro_pm.description: W2 flux uncertainty in mag units from profile-fit photometry including motion

w2rchi2_pm.name: W2RCHI2_PM
w2rchi2_pm.description: Reduced chi^2 of the W2 profile-fit photometry measurement including motion est

rchi2_pm.name: RCHI2_PM
rchi2_pm.description: Combined Reduced chi^2 in all bands for the psf photometry includes src motion

pmcode.name: PMCODE
pmcode.description: Motion estimate quality code: the format is ABCCC, where A is the number of components in the passive blend group (including the primary) before any are removed or added, B is "Y" or "N" to indicate "Yes" or "No" that a secondary blend component replaced the primary, and CCC is the distance in hundredths of an arcsec between the PM position solution for the mean observation epoch and the stationary solution

nsteps_pm.name: NSTEPS_PM
nsteps_pm.description: number of steps in all iterations

dist.name: DIST
dist.description: radial distance between source positions in ascending and descending scans

dw1mag.name: DW1MAG
dw1mag.description: difference in w1mpro between ascending and descending scans

rch2w1.name: RCH2W1
rch2w1.description: chi-square for dw1mag (1 degree of freedom)

dw2mag.name: DW2MAG
dw2mag.description: difference in w2mpro between ascending and descending scans

rch2w2.name: RCH2W2
rch2w2.description: chi-square for dw2mag (1 degree of freedom)

delon.name: DELON
delon.description: descending scan - ascending scan ecliptic longitude difference (notes)

delat.name: DELAT
delat.description: descending scan - ascending scan ecliptic longitude difference

chi2pmra.name: CHI2PMRA
chi2pmra.description: chi-square for PMRA difference (1 degree of freedom)

chi2pmdec.name: CHI2PMDEC
chi2pmdec.description: chi-square for PMDec difference (1 degree of freedom)

ka.name: KA
ka.description: astrometry usage code: 0 neither the ascending nor the descending scan provided a solution; 1 only the ascending scan provided a solution; 2 only the descending scan provided a solutio; 3 both scans provided solutions which were combined in the relevant way

k1.name: K1
k1.description: W1 photometry usage code: 0 neither the ascending nor the descending scan provided a solution; 1 only the ascending scan provided a solution; 2 only the descending scan provided a solutio; 3 both scans provided solutions which were combined in the relevant way

k2.name: K2
k2.description: W2 photometry usage code: 0 neither the ascending nor the descending scan provided a solution; 1 only the ascending scan provided a solution; 2 only the descending scan provided a solutio; 3 both scans provided solutions which were combined in the relevant way

km.name: KM
km.description: proper motion usage code: 0 neither the ascending nor the descending scan provided a solution; 1 only the ascending scan provided a solution; 2 only the descending scan provided a solutio; 3 both scans provided solutions which were combined in the relevant way

dist_x.name: DIST_X
dist_x.description: distance between CatWISE and AllWISE source

cc_flags.name: CC_FLAGS
cc_flags.description: worst case 4 character cc_flag from AllWISE (See Table A1 in Eisenhardt et al. (2020))

w1cc_map.name: W1CC_MAP
w1cc_map.description: worst case w1cc_map from AllWISE (See Table A1 in Eisenhardt et al. (2020))

w1cc_map_str.name: W1CC_MAP_STR
w1cc_map_str.description: worst case w1cc_map_str from AllWISE (See Table A1 in Eisenhardt et al. (2020))

w2cc_map.name: W2CC_MAP
w2cc_map.description: worst case w2cc_map from AllWISE (See Table A1 in Eisenhardt et al. (2020))

w2cc_map_str.name: W2CC_MAP_STR
w2cc_map_str.description: worst case w2cc_map_str from AllWISE (See Table A1 in Eisenhardt et al. (2020))

n_aw.name: N_AW
n_aw.description: number of sources within 2.75" in AllWISE

w1ab_map.name: W1AB_MAP
w1ab_map.description: unWISE artifact bitmask contamination map for W1

w1ab_map_str.name: W1AB_MAP_STR
w1ab_map_str.description: unWISE artifact bitmask contamination string for W1

w2ab_map.name: W2AB_MAP
w2ab_map.description: unWISE artifact bitmask contamination map for W2

w2ab_map_str.name: W2AB_MAP_STR
w2ab_map_str.description: unWISE artifact bitmask contamination string for W1

unwise_objid.name: UNWISE_OBJID
unwise_objid.description: UnWISE Object ID (only present in CatWISE 2020)
